title: RMA request
content:
Dear support team,
I have a problem with my google pixel 2 64GB it keep restarting by itself i tried everything I can do (install updates, factory reset, clear cash, safe mode).
I need your help please, I think the phone still under warranty.
I'm in Chile now but I can send the phone back to my brother in law in the  USA for checking.
I tried to apply for call back three times but nothing.
